listProperty.title: Landlords: Track & List your properties
listProperty.description:
Track your properties and List them to qualified Buyers/Tenants/Agents

For Landlords/Property Managers:
Whether you're looking to Track, Rent, Buy, or Sell, our platform has you covered.

"AssetXToken" Your comprehensive "360° property management platform"

"AssetXToken" If you are looking to centralize information related to your properties, issue logging.

Join us today and experience the future of real estate management

findProperty.title: For Tenants:
findProperty.description:
Searching the web for your off-market dream property has never been easier. With our user-friendly search feature, you can quickly find the perfect home that meets all your needs.

• You can also reach out to agents/landlords directly and inform them of what you are looking for. Catch those off-market gems.
• Avoid discussions when issues arrive and request your agent to use our tool to complete a move-in and move-out reports.
• Nothing can be more frustrating than a Landlord/Agent that can't be reached. Our Troubleshooting tool connects you with the pre-selected repairmen or maintenance crew for a hassle free resolution of most issues that can occur during a rental contract.

Join us today and ensure your next house can feel like home.

growBusiness.title: Agents: Grow Your Network
growBusiness.description:
Access exclusive/Off-market listings, get connected and manage properties efficiently.

For Real Estate Agents:
Our core goal is to offer a comprehensive "360° property management platform". So as an Agent benefit from this as you can list, track and manage properties within your portfolio, making it easier than ever to service your customer base whether they are landlords, tenants or buyers. Imagine having all the details of properties within your portfolio accessible wherever you are. Within a few clicks knowing which contractors you can call for a particular property. Hence relieving administrative burden and being able to provide a log towards landlords of issues which emerged.

As AssetXToken is focused on Asset Management we leave the selling and renting to you. Discover Off-Market or Co-Agent properties. As soon as a landlord flags availability of a property you can ask them to become a (co-)agent. Our tool has standard contracts available and it allows you to make a detailed (easy) inspection report.

discover.title: About Us
discover.subtitle: Find your Dream Property Today!
discover.description:
Modern times command a systematic and centralized application which covers all relevant property information ranging from; inspection reports; rental and sales-agreements, agent assignments, maintenance crew details, issue escalation and more.

We are not a 'property website', but a property management platform assisting landlords to manage their assets, for Realty Agents to contact property owners/buyers, for tenants to ensure their rental place is followed up and administered according to international norms even with issue-escalation flow which documents and archives issues arising during your stay.

step1.title: Find your Dream Property for Sale Today!
step1.description: Browse through our extensive collection of properties for sale in your desired location

step2.title: Found the perfect property
step2.description: Schedule a viewing with just a few clicks. Our streamlined booking system makes it easy to arrange property viewings at your convenience. Connect directly with landlords or agents, choose your preferred time slot, and receive instant confirmation. No more back-and-forth emails or phone calls – just simple, efficient scheduling that gets you one step closer to your dream home.

step3.title: Manage & Track Your Property Assets
step3.description: Experience professional asset management with AssetXToken's comprehensive platform. Centralize all property information, track maintenance requests, manage contracts, and monitor your portfolio performance. Our systematic approach helps landlords maintain complete oversight of their assets, streamline operations, and make informed decisions. Whether you're managing a single property or an extensive portfolio, our platform provides the tools you need for efficient, professional real estate asset management.

tutorial.title: Professional Asset Management Made Simple
tutorial.subtitle: Manage your real estate portfolio efficiently. Track properties, manage contracts, and streamline operations on our comprehensive platform.

landlords.title: Landlords: Manage Properties Efficiently
landlords.description: Centralize all your property information, track maintenance, manage contracts, and maintain complete control of your real estate assets.

buyers.title: Buyers: Find Investment Opportunities
buyers.description: Browse available properties, connect with landlords and agents, and build a diversified real estate portfolio with professional asset tracking.

b2bMarket.title: Marketplace: Connect & Collaborate
b2bMarket.description: Connect with property owners, agents, and buyers. Access off-market listings and exclusive opportunities through our professional network.

notice.title: ⚠️ Important: Account Required
notice.description: To access the full platform features, create an account. This enables you to manage properties, connect with stakeholders, and access professional asset management tools.

tutorial.footerText: New to professional asset management? Start with our tutorial to learn the basics.

cta.title: your 360° partner in property success
cta.description: Discover a wide range of properties in your desired location.

collab.title: Collaboration
collab.subtitle: Let's grow together
collab.intro: AssetXToken is a brand from Vandepoel BV which predominantly holds rental assets in Belgium. Based on the painpoints we experienced we decided it was time to develop a central platform to store information of properties and to relief Landlords/agents of administrative matters. As a new Asset Management tool we realize we are just taking our first steps and are always open for improvements in flows and service and country specific requirements.
collab.callToAction: So if you would like to roll-out a similar portal for your country or region or would like to see us enhance any features for Belgium or Thailand let us know.

q1.question: What is your scope of operations?
q1.answer: AssetXToken is a brand from Vandepoel BV which predominantly holds rental assets in Belgium. Besides that we are now working on AssetXToken.com which aims to alleviate and facilitate the administration for Asset Managers, Landlords and Agents.

features.title: Our Key Features:
features.feature1Desc: Browse through properties for Sale/Rent in your desired location
features.feature2Desc: Schedule a viewing or contact the Landlord/Agent with just a few clicks
features.feature3Desc: Auto-pilot your property or at least manage them centrally
features.feature4Desc: Avoid discussions and issue Move In/Out reports the easy way
features.feature5Desc: Use available pictures and info to create a folder to hand over to clients
features.feature6Desc: Allows Tenants to easily raise issues and unburdens Agents and Landlords
features.feature9Desc: Laying-out co-invest framework to profit sharing through fractional ownership/Tokenization

q2.question: Do you consider collaborations?
q2.answer: Sure we do. As a new Asset Management tool we realize we are just taking our first steps and are always open for improvements in flows and service and country specific requirements. So if you would like to roll-out a similar portal for your country or region or would like to see us enhance any features for Belgium or Thailand let us know.
